Bootstrap Navigable Table

newsletter

Supported keyboard shortcuts

jump
⌘alt + arrow keys
move
⌘alt + shift + up/down
insert
⌘alt + enter (+ shift)
duplicate
⌘alt + d (+ shift)
delete
⌘alt + shift + backspace

Note: This demo is using the Bootstrap Editable Table plugin for auto-adding of new rows, and for styling.
